name: Kore wa Ai de, Koi ja Nai
nutshell:
From Lovesick Alley:
Contrary to her girly appearance, Yaotome Ren is still inexperienced in love because she dreams of having a once-in-a-lifetime romance. Enter Hidaka Yuusei, whose sadistic and strict attitude annoys Ren, and because of that, the two don't get along. What's gonna happen if one day, Ren wakes up from an accident, only to realize that she's now a different person?!

name: On the Day of the Fireworks, on Top of a Jungle Gym
Hatsujou Animal
nutshell: Kyoichi's elite high school and the delinquent school next door are separated by only a fence. One day by the fence, Kyoichi meets Chiba, a fearsome student known for speaking with his fists……a school story of star-crossed lovers.

name: Mahouka Koukou no Rettousei - Double Seven-hen
nutshell:
The second year has started! Mikihiko has been promoted to Course 1, Tatsuya has entered the new Magical Engineering Course, and trouble is brewing between Saegusa Mayumi's younger twin sisters and 1st year representative Shippou Takuma, a member of the 18 Assistant Houses' Shippou Household.
Adaptation of the original novel's volume 12.

name: STAR WARS: Lost Stars
nutshell:
The Empire can be seductive, particularly if you're an aspiring young pilot...
Thane Kyrell and Ciena Ree both know this very well when they enroll Imperial Academy, eager to pursue their dreams. When Thane discovers the darker side of the Empire, though, and defects to the Rebellion, the pair's lifelong friendship will be put to the ultimate test.
Will Thane and Ciena's relationship—or even they themselves—survive this galactic conflict...?

Links:
Bookwalker

name: Avian Wander
nutshell: Frederica, the older sister. She contracts a demon, hunts the souls of the wicked, and sends them to hell. She is the silver seal. Howly, the younger brother. He was given his life by a demon, according to his sister's wish. He serves and protects the silver seal. He is the warrior seal. What will the world give to them?

name: Houseki no Kuni (Minimalist Color)
nutshell: In the distant future, a new life form called Houseki (gems) are born. The 28 Houseki must fight against the moon dwellers who want to attack them and turn them into decorations, thus each gem is assigned a role such as a fighter or a medic. Though they hope to fight the moon dwellers, Phos is a gem who is given no assignment until the gems' master Adamantine asks them to write an encyclopedia.

name: Witch Angel
nutshell:
(from ebookjapan):
This SF fantasy depicts the mysterious events involving Kejime Monono, a boy with a twisted face and a dim head, and a beautiful witch angel who haunts him. Kejime Monono is a junior high school student whose school life is ridiculed by the students. A beautiful woman, Rei Tokinowa, suddenly appears in front of him and confesses to Kejime that she loves him, and begins to show her ardent affection for him......?

name: Hotel Ojakgyo
nutshell:
The Chilseok festival is coming soon and there will be a gathering at the Hotel Ojakgyo to celebrate the event. However, in reality, the event is actually for alphas and omegas come together to have an orgy!
Im E-Jun is a rare, high- quality omega. Omegas of his stature are desired by many. Even so, Im E-Jun has always liked his close friend, Kang Do-hoon, who is an alpha. However, Sihun, another alpha, has his eyes set on Im E-Jun.
What is to happen when the day of the festival finally comes?

name: Dance with Devils -Blight-
nutshell: Tachibana Ritsuka is a female second-year high school student who attends Shiko Academy in Shiko Town. She enjoys her school life while living with her mother Maria, but one day, that balance falls into ruin when she discovers several of her attractive male classmate are demons.

name: I'm a Royal Tutor in My Sister's Dress
nutshell:
An ordinary boy called Sherlock Doyle is captured and forced to put on his twin sister’s dress by the Emperor’s diplomat to be shipped to a small country called Ehren. His genius sister, Glinda, went missing two days before she’s supposed to be sent to Ehren to be a royal tutor for the King’s children. The sudden life change is too overwhelming for Sherlock, but he sees no way out. Later, he finds out the disturbing truth about the kingdom’s intention with his sister.
Scanulator has pre-added watermarks, not added by myself nor (possibly) a third party.
See The Web Archive for more information.

name: The Two of Us
nutshell: In The Two of Us a girl is fascinated by the new transfer student, who won't be staying long and so plans not to get close to any of her new classmates.

name: Koizora
nutshell: Mika is just a normal high school student who dreams of having a wonderful love. And then one day, she happens to meet Hiro, the guy of her destiny. While experiencing many sad events, and while getting hurt, the time she spends with him is still one of the most happy moments in her life…

name: Motto Ganbare! Nakamura-kun!!
nutshell: It was love-at-first-sight when Nakamura met his classmate, Hirose. The two became friends after the shy and awkward Nakamura finally worked up the nerve to speak to him, but being buddy-buddy with your crush is a whole new kind of torture! And as he watches some other guy cuddle up with Hirose like casual bros, Nakamura tries to keep his head from exploding. Why can't that be him?! Enjoy the hilarious new misadventures of Nakamura desperately trying to keep it together and not scare Hirose off. Hang in there, Nakamura!

name: Tokyo Deadline
nutshell: Even if this love, this tenderness will bring about the destruction of the world… "Because… I met you." Mashiro Ouha was a normal high school student… until the day she got attacked by snake-like creatures. Oblivious to her destiny, she had always believed that her life would be an ordinary one…

name: Closezone
nutshell: Ika, Heri, Reza and Bara are all childhood best friends. Close enough to consider each other soulmates, there's only one problem with their friendship: They all promised each other to never fall in love with each other. Now in high school, that promise is proving harder to keep than any of them expected…

name: Tabecha Dame
nutshell: Machi happens to take care of Kanata, a son of her father's boss, for three days. Kanata is younger than Machi and a junior high school student. Machi first considered it an easy job. However, Kanata shows somewhat precocious way of behaving, which makes her startled. She wonders if it is a feeling of love!?

name: Mirror Ball Flashing Magic
nutshell: These stories are about love, desire and friendship of women. Told by women.

name: Maple Purple
nutshell: Akagi, after being rejected by a girl that he likes and punched by a rival, Rukawa, for accidentally stepping into his confession moment with the girl, wants revenge against Rukawa for various reasons. He and his teammates decided to challenge Rukawa and his team against a game of basketball in the regional tournament. Who will win this basketball game?

name: My Hyung's Sunbae
nutshell: Injun, who returns from studying abroad, is heartbroken to hear that his (ex-)lover, Saein, was imprinted by Jaekyung, who is rumored to be promiscuous bastard. While walking away from Injun toward Jaekyung, Saein does not see a huge truck near him. Injun and Jaekyung, who threw themselves to save him, are caught in an accident. After not waking up for a long time, Injun woke up and was shocked to see his own face in the mirror...that he's now in Jaekyung body!!

name: Kemono Friends a la Carte
nutshell:
An anthology of short stories and illustrations from various authors and artists following the anime storyline.
This series of comics was originally released on the Young Ace UP website the week before the last episode of the anime aired and then compiled in an anthology volume.

name: Sentouin, Hakenshimasu!
nutshell:
The Secret Society Kisaragi has one mission: world domination! They claim to be an evil organization, but their scientist is eccentric, their hot female generals wear little clothing, and they’re surprisingly concerned about the fate of the world?! No. 6 is a Combatant for Kisaragi, meaning his body has been reconstructed to be stronger and obey the orders of the generals. His latest mission? To do recon on an unknown alien planet with his new partner, the deadpan android Alice. There, he meets a busty female knight… riding a unicorn?! Thus begins their hilarious invasion of a magical fantasy world!

Links:

Anime Season 1 on ANN

name: Ukyo no Ozora
nutshell: The heir to a secret martial art created by legendary swordsman Miyamoto Musashi returns to Japan, to prove that his martial art is the strongest.

name: Rising to the Azure Sky
nutshell:
"Rising to the Azure Sky", a manhua serialized by Golden Orange Comics, follows Ling Yufei after he overcame many obstacles on his journey to become a pilot. However, sudden policy changes made by his company dashed his dreams with the introduction of his new captain, who's younger than him and is airborne trained?! Under these circumstances, Ling Yufei can only rely on his wits and partake on this Romance Airline…
Skyhawk Airlines's romantic plot is about to take off, coupled with the amusing shenanigans of both pilots as well as their onboard cabin crew!

name: The Student I'm Tutoring is in Heat - Please Don't Tease Sensei's Kurikuri
nutshell:
Minako Nishiwaki's life is a constant struggle for money since her mother is addicted to gambling and regularly incurs large amounts of debt. To pay off the latest debt, Minako accepts a position as a live-in tutor to Naoki, the rebellious son of a rich family. He is in his last year of high school and has terrible grades, but if she can successfully get him into university, the family will pay her enough to take care of the debt.
However, it seems Naoki requires some... special motivation.

name: No. 6 - Drown In Eve (Doujinshi)
nutshell: Pairing: Nezumi x Shion
